original_text: And I have also established my covenant with them, to give them the land of Canaan, the land of their pilgrimage, wherein they were strangers.
korean_text: 가나안 땅 곧 그들이 거류하는 땅을 그들에게 주기로 그들과 언약하였더니

sentences.original_text: And I have also established my covenant with them
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 내가 그들과 내 언약을 세웠고

sentences.original_text: to give them the land of Canaan
